content: materials to make three washcloths… - 1 skein of purl soho s cotton pure 1 100% organic cotton each skein is 279 yards approximately 93 yards required for each washcloth note that you use the entire skein to make all three washcloths so to get three square washcloths please make sure your gauge is correct - us 7 4 5 mm straight or 16-inch circular needles 2 - if using straight needles two us 7 double pointed needles 3 for i-cord gauge 30 stitches and 52 row = 4 inches in stitch pattern size finished dimensions 8-inch square 1 https //www purlsoho com/cotton-pure html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796_23802 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23799
